long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I built this chrome extension specifically to help you learn language faster.

1. Set a hotkey for opening up the extension popup.
2. Highlight whatever text on a website.
3. Press hotkey to open up the extension.

# Updated 1.3.1
Fixed if having multiple google translate windows, only one would close. 
# Updated 1.3
This extension will now works on texts inside shadow DOM or embedded HTML.
# Updated 1.2
Added Google Translate, which automatically closed after closing extension popup.
# Updated 1.1
User can now skip the right-clicking action and directly translate highlighted text.
